description: Does dressing for colder temps get any better than throwing on a lined and hooded flannel? Rhetorical question. This hooded flannel shirt is the ultimate in stylish warmth. Recycled wool blend too? It's a winner.
name: Prana Asgard Hooded Flannel Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 31% Recycled Polyester, 55% Recycled Wool, 7% Recycled Nylon, 4% Recycled Acrylic, 3% Other Fibers
